name: P_2 0.03 (FPS GAME)
description:
**IMPORTANT** If the game is hitting low framerates in browser we reccomend you try pressing the TAB key and disabling shadows, if this still does not fix your problems you can download the game below. it runs on Windows/Mac/Linux and it will solve a lot of performance issues we are having right now in this development build.

30-06-2020 First Prototype Release date.

Overall Design: Luca - N. Tran

Programming: Luca 

Art : N. Tran
